Class Heading

  • java.lang.Object
    • Heading

  • public class Heading
extends java.lang.Object
    Heading class is used by both player and zombies to determine which way they are facing, both currently and next. Headings go in all directions and are based on the x and y movement/coordinates.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
